GSD.description:
ext4: fix inode leak in ext4_xattr_inode_create() on an error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 9882601ee689975c1c0076ee65bf222a2a35e535. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ext4: fix inode leak in ext4_xattr_inode_create() on an error path
